website_summaries.verdict: Despite its "good enough" picture quality, the TCL Roku TV is one of our favorite entry-level sets, thanks to an awesome smart-TV suite and rock-bottom pricing.
pros: Roku TV delivers the simplest, most comprehensive smart-TV experience on the market
A superb user interface puts its thousands of apps and streaming video on the same plane as regular TV
It's also less expensive than just about any other smart TV
cons: Competing entry-level TVs, namely Vizio's E series, deliver better image quality for a similar price
Sparse picture controls and no Ethernet port

customer_reviews.title: Crap, don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: When the tv was 7 months old one of the ports stopped working. Shortly after that white spots appeared on the screen. The tv shuts down on its own and appears dead. Wait a couple of hours and it will work again. Totally unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but trouble
customer_reviews.text: .'ve been trying to get this TV set working properly for at least five months. The TV will restart itself while you're watching live television then recycle back to the home screen and you have to reactivate the satellite, three or four minutes go by and you miss whatever you were watching. I've contacted TCL by email and five or six times by telephone. In addition Amazon will disappear from the home screen and I have to do a factory reset to get it back on. I've contacted TCL by telephone and email no one seems to know what the problem is and how to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: A Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This TV does everything, except make it easy to turn on and off. You have to manually turn it on and off. I love the remote (except for the on/off button) because it has Netflix and Prime right at my fingertips. I love that it also comes with Roku which is outstanding all by itself. I also now get a local channel, which has news, so now I don't even need cable. The picture is HD and very clear. It looks so good. I got this on a Black Friday deal and I wish I would have bought 2. This was great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Blue

customer_reviews.title: 2019-2020 Review
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this television around 4 years ago. It has a great picture and enough hdmi/usb ports to satisfy the basic needs of a 'family telivision', but after "countless updates" it has lagged down over the years. I have purchashed a Roku device for a seperate tv in my househould and it has a much faster user interface. I feel like Roku is taking on the same marketing strategy as Apple does, with slowing downing older moddles to make consumers purchase the updated model. If you're looking to purchase thise item in 2019-2020, I'd definitely look for a newer model.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this tv in April and I wish I hadn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tv in April and I wish I hadn't. You get what you pay for. Tv freezes, the remote is extremely cheap and needs new batteries constantly, my screen goes black but the audio still runs and I have to turn off and on to get it to work properly. The sound is terrible- differs with what show or app you are using but have to use subtitles most of the time because the voices are unclear or washed out. Have tried every setting or adjusted the volume and it's a big headache. Would not buy this brand ever again or recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jas BishopTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: our ISP discovered that the first one sent had a bad interface card
customer_reviews.text: This is my second identical TCL TV. After a lot of time, our ISP discovered that the first one sent had a bad interface card, preventing it from connecting to my router. Previously, we thought the problem had been caused either by the modem/ router or from our Internet provider. Amazon couldn't have been more professional, since I was beyond the usual return policy. They asked me to speak with the manufacturer, who had me run the set through a series of tests. When those didn't solve the problem, Amazon agreed to swap the set for another one. The second set works perfectly, and we are very pleased with the picture and the overall performance.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B. Armel

customer_reviews.title: Great features for the size and price
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for bedroom. I paired this with a Mohu Leaf antenna and it found 47 over-the-air channels. Picture quality is very good, as is sound. Set-up was quick and easy. Because we were already using Roku, it loaded our channels from our account. It would have been nice to have a Pandora button on the remote, but no big deal. Very happy with the price we paid on Black Friday for this set ($125) and the features were just what we were looking for in a small set. Lots of free offers if you want to try different stations before you commit.
customer_reviews.author: musicman

customer_reviews.title: This TV was perfect for a bedroom TV
customer_reviews.text: This TV was perfect for a bedroom TV. It has all of the apps loaded onto it already and has a very easy to use remote. If you are going to be primarily watching Netflix, Hulu, and/or Amazon Prime, this is a great little TV for the price. The picture is very sharp. Overall, I couldn't be happier with this purchase and have considered buying others for different rooms in my house because of how easy it is to use and I don't use traditional cable (streaming only).
customer_reviews.author: Julie S

customer_reviews.title: Great picture...great price!
customer_reviews.text: Had done the research and decided TCL TV's were what we wanted for our new home. We bought (5) of them in different sizes and different picture qualities. We love all of them! The has a great picture and is perfect for our guest bedrooms. The only think we find is the 32" and 40" does not turn on instantly so we just had to get into the habit of waiting a few moments instead of accidentally turning the tv off because of impatience.
customer_reviews.author: Rox Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I've heard great things about this brand
customer_reviews.text: I've heard great things about this brand, and I'm sure it's good, but the screw holes on the bottom of the TV for the legs were not aligned properly. The screws literally wouldn't fit, so I couldn't put the legs on at all. I returned it. I'm going to purchase another one, however, in the meantime I can not give it higher than a one-star rating. If you're going to get the TV, be aware that with a Chinese company which is still this young, you're going to experience manufacturer inconsistencies such as this.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Wifi set up is easy. The resolution is lower than I usually like
customer_reviews.text: Smartest electronic purchase I've made! No sticks, no "smart tv" with outdated software, just what I wanted. I am getting rid of my Direct TV and only streaming now. This is light weight, just plug it in and it plays. Wifi set up is easy. The resolution is lower than I usually like, but so far it has been fine with all the shows and movies I've watched. AND it is inexpensive. Way to Go! No long a prisoner of "cable or satellite". I am free with choices that work for me. I'm not paying for sports channels, cartoons, home shopping... just what I like. So I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MorganOBX

customer_reviews.title: and wasn't sure it was going to look like I thought it should
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical buying this TV at first. Was not familiar with the brand, had no need for Roku, and wasn't sure it was going to look like I thought it should, but the price was more than right. Then I saw its screen, now I'm a believer! Not a trace, of doubt in my mind. Seriously though, this TV has exceeded my expectations. Bought it as a bedroom TV so I wasn't stuck watching some horrid kids show all the time. The built-in wifi and apps are handy, the picture quality is on par with a top tier 720p television, and the sound is great too! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Dolar value great, but forcing ROKU registration to use TV is not
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th TCL TV between home & business. An amazing value. But ... This is my first with a Roku attached & there was no workaround to use the TV without signing up for ROKY & that was a PITA I had to give my credit card info, etc. I had to input on the TV as well as a browser (various codes, pw, info, etc.) There might be a workaround, but I could not find it & should not have to do all that just to be able to see something through the AV cables (not included)
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever
customer_reviews.text: Great Picture!! Easily picks up all the wifi networks available. Picture Quality is better than expected for the price. I did read all the reviews so was careful while unpacking to not grab the edges and pull the TV up out of the package. We turned it over and used the styrofoam material to get it out of the box. There is a protective film on the edges and when we went to remove that the edge of the television definitely shifted. So BE CAREFUL!! The price and quality is worth the extra care needed when unpacking and setting up.
customer_reviews.author: Bettybakebake

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the TCL 32-inch Smart LED TV
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the TCL 32-inch Smart LED TV, since it was an excellent deal. The TV functioned flawlessly for 2 days, and then stopped working on the 3rd day. After troubleshooting (insuring WIFI networks were working properly, gateway was accepting MAC address, performing factory reset), the TV was still unable to connect to any of the WIFI networks available, and in some cases would not detect them at all. I have 4 Vizio's (apparently I have to many TV's), and have not once had an issue. This could of possibly been a lemon, but my advice is to look elsewhere if you are using the TV for its "smart" capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge A Cortez Jr

customer_reviews.title: HDMI slots are not accessible when mounted on the wall
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I'll update this review if I have any problems in the future. My one complaint is that the HDMI ports are located in a position where you can't reach them with the TV mounted on the wall. The USB slot and the A/V jacks are mounted on the side where you can reach them, but the HDMI slots are in a weird place on the back where you can't. So you have to connect your HDMI cables (and essentially leave them permanently connected) before mounting it. Not a huge problem, but it just seems odd.
customer_reviews.author: Molly J

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking unit, great concept but it freezes constantly and loses connection to wifi frequently. The only way to fix it when it does this is to unplug and reboot. Not cool when you have to do this at least three times a day. I haven't been able to watch more than a couple of hours without issue. You get what you pay for I guess. Problems started the night I set it up. We've now had it for three weeks and have spent more time troubleshooting issues than watching anything. I get that it's a cheap tv, but I expected it to work for at least 24 hours before taking a nosedive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When it works it is great, however
customer_reviews.text: When it works it is great, however, as others have noted the internet connectivity is problematic. I have no trouble with any other devices but the wifi on this TV is incredibly unreliable and sometimes completely unusable. Also, it appears I am unable to directly connect my macbook to this TV via HDMI cable and use it as a monitor. This is quite surprising as I have never had that issue with any other TV. Pro: picture quality, price, roku features when it's working. Cons: Roku features often don't work. Unable to connect my macbook even with a direct HDMI connection.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It’s cheap and decent... until it’s just cheap.
customer_reviews.text: This was a decent tv to start. Inexpensive, fairly decent picture for the price range. The roku function is good. It always had a couple quirks like the sound cutting from the output at times. Now as time goes on it’s functions are becoming more glitchy. Apps won’t load, signals are undetectable, WiFi stops working. I’m having to reset it frequently. I knew it wasn’t going to be the greatest, but I thought I would get a little more time out of it. I’ve had it for a bit over 3 years, it does get a lot of use. So the hunt begins, I won’t be as cheap this time.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZADDICT

customer_reviews.title: Not sure this TV will last long
customer_reviews.text: I like this set, but I have a Roku box that works just as well. This TV has had a few issues of not responding. When trying to turn off the set from the remote or the button on the back of the TV neither would respond. I had to unplug the set to get it back to working. That doesn't bode well for the longevity of this product. There are no controls on the set itself, it is all controlled from the remote. If the remote dies, there will be a big problem using this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Linda R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Tv for the money considering a Roku alone will set you back 40+ bucks
customer_reviews.text: Nice TV. Runs smooth and much like a Roku. Purchased for my Grandmother for Christmas does not have a built in Antenna and the remote does not have input for headphones like a stand alone Roku which would have been great for my grandmother. Curious if a replacement remote will work that does include a input for headphones .. It's surprisingly has a nice picture. It's a bit thick compared to other TVs. Volume turned all the way up sounds horrible, makes it hard to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: WiFi Not reliable & no sound connection :(
customer_reviews.text: I like the picture quality. I like the remote functions. But the sound input broke off just shortly after I bought it and therefore I cannot use my brand new sound bar with it. Took it to a local Best Buy but they wouldn’t repair it because I didn’t buy it there--& they couldn't guarantee the repair would be less than total TV's value. It also frequently shuts off my Internet connection and I have to completely restart the TV and re-connect my Wi-Fi. Wish I’d known it would be this unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: JL Hodgins

customer_reviews.title: Roku TV rocks
customer_reviews.text: Saw this TV on sale. Checked out reviews which were mostly positive. I watch a lot of Netflix and prime, so I wanted a smart TV that would be easy to use. I have a Samsung that works OK, but there are times I had to wait for the TV to download updates. There were also times that they did not sync updates with the apps. Roku works well and is much less buggy. Also a great feature is that you can download a remote app for phone and tablet. Then you can use headphones connected to your smartphone for TV sound. Perfect for late night watching.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sound is not as good. The picture quality is so-so
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what the positive reviews were about, because my experience so far has been........ MEH! The sound is not as good. The picture quality is so-so, and it takes a long time to load! I have great internet connection and great wifi, so THAT is not the problem. You get what you pay for. I saw it as a great deal for $199 (including tax), and I thought I'd enjoy watching Netflix and Amazon on a larger screen than my tablet/computer. I don't recommend it. Perhaps it's because it's a 2015 version, but THAT was what sites like CNET recommended. Ha!!!! DON'T buy this.
customer_reviews.author: sollie park

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest TV in the world, but the price was right and Roku is fine
customer_reviews.text: Decent cheap TV for the garage. Remote is pretty lame, with no direct entry for channel numbers, and volume buttons on the right side, not the top. Roku is nice, better than the unusable programs on our bedroom Visio (admittedly an old one, the new Visios are probably better.) It has crashed several times. It stops responding to the remote while using the Roku features and needs to be restarted to work again. That's annoying. Not a lot of sound volume when using the Amazon Prime TV app, but ok on broadcast, Netflix, NBC Sports and other apps. Three stars up to four because price was so low.
customer_reviews.author: M. Frobisher

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV even after 3 years of use.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Smart TV. Works Great. So happy I choose this TV. Had it for 3 years now with no issues. It has apps preinstalled like YouTube, Netflix, And Amazon Prime. You an also search for apps to use. You can also cast Video and Audio from your phone via apps. I actually ditched one of my cable boxes and saved $10 a month by using this TV to exclusively stream via WiFi. You can use cable on it if you want, just to be clear. Lots if inputs, like multi HDMI, USB, Composite, cable coaxial.
customer_reviews.author: Rallybas

customer_reviews.title: Should have lasted longer than 3 years!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this TV for 3 years. Recently it started turning off the picture but continuing to play the sound. All I had to do was turn it off and back on to correct this. Sometimes it would be days before it happened again. Today it started flashing the picture off and on every 15 seconds and now it's happening every 3 seconds. Nothing seems to help. It was a great TV but I think it should have lasted longer than 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Montville

customer_reviews.title: First Setup Without Swearing a Blue Streak!
customer_reviews.text: Toshiba had been my go to brand but for some reason they are rare on Amazon. This TCL had the features plus Roku so I took a chance. I don't recall a setup being smoother. For some reason all three of my Amazon Fire Sticks would not mirror cast from any of my three Fire tablets, all stopping at the same time and no answers from tech support. No worries with pre-installed Roku. Very good sound. Excellent picture and a decent remote. I only wish you coukd punch up tv channels instead of only scrolling. This may be the best TV I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Phaeton

customer_reviews.title: Solid value for the dollars spent - which wasn't much
customer_reviews.text: We really like this TV, however, it does seem slower in response than our Roku 2's. Also, several of the new Roku apps (like Netflix) cram too much info onscreen at one time resulting in painfully small print. They would probably be fine on a 50"+ TV, but not on a 32" screen. And you do not have the ability to go back to the old apps that did not clutter up the screen as bad. Picture is fine, speakers are weak - really benefits from an external soundbar or sound system (which we have).
customer_reviews.author: Macon

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 13 months!!!!
customer_reviews.text: STAY AWAY.....thirteen months after buying this tv, it quit working...Of course the warranty is only for 12 months. Contacted customer support for TCL and had me try factory reset, which did not work. They informed me to contact Amazon if I purchased extended warrant (which I didn't) or have the TV repaired which will cost upwards of $200.00. The price is great, but, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turn for the worst
customer_reviews.text: Well after having this great TV for a little under 2 years, it took a nosedive. My TV has been turning off in the middle of shows and restarting in the middle of movies. When I emailed TCL through their support system with my exact TV serial number about the issues, they don’t respond and I can’t get a hold of anyone. I’ve also heard they are pulling out of the U.S. with consumer facing products. I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JBurr

customer_reviews.title: NOT VESA mount standards! This TV is 200x150, not 100x100 or 200x200 or anything ordinary.
customer_reviews.text: Beware of mounting hole pattern! It claims to be VESA 200*150 and there is really no such thing. TCL Customer service told me this is a "known issue" and it is being "escalated" but all she could say was "sorry". They did answer the phone quickly, I guess that's something. I think "rigging" it will be less hassle than sending it back. Only got it yesterday, so can't say much more about it. I like the picture and Roku interface. Love having the Roku and volume on same remote. If you're not ever going to mount it, or you're prepared for some extra hassle I'd say it's a dandy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie

customer_reviews.title: This television is not VESA compliant.
customer_reviews.text: The television itself is great, and super easy to set up. We have enjoyed watching it, BUT, when we decided to mount it in the wall, we discovered that the holes on the back were in non standard locations. This was a colossal pain; my partner had to drill holes in the plate that came with the mounting kit, and that was VERY inconvenient. There are mounting kits that works, and parts you can buy to modify mounting kits, and the television itself is great, but it's good to know in advance what you'll have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Queer Femme-inist

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT buy! Super lightweight, easy install, very clear screen. I bought this TV for my almost 70 year old Techy-Challeneged mom for Christmas. I installed it in less than 20 min & she can easily navigate around between her local stations on cable and the streaming options without any trouble. I was amazed at how great the picture quality & sound options were. Cannot recommend the TV enough-if you're considering it, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Trying to help

customer_reviews.title: Roku is the best streaming device
customer_reviews.text: I own a few Roku 3 boxes around the house, but was still using a Chromecast in my bedroom. When that TV broke I knew I wanted to get a Roku TV. For only $170 you essentially get the added capabilities of a Roku 2, maybe Roku 3?? Either way it's a great deal when you factor in saving $50-100 for the cost of a seperate Roku. I have found it takes a little for the apps (Netflix, Hulu, etc) to open. Might just be my slow wifi though (speedtest is registering 18-20 Mbps). Definitely worth the money for a great picture at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jon K

customer_reviews.title: ... this TV largely because another reviewer said it was easy to get up and running
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV largely because another reviewer said it was easy to get up and running. I took it out of the box - I plugged it into the wall - turned it on - clicked through a few set-up steps - and it's been working fine for the last 2+ months. It did take me a while to figure out the "closed captioning" feature, but I tend to do things backwards. For $250 (a major purchase for me; pocket change for others), I'm totally satisfied. The hard part? Getting my 27" old school TV out of tiny apartment hallway and finding someone to tote it down 2 flights of stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Holiday

customer_reviews.title: A very nice TV
customer_reviews.text: This tv is awesome, even for 720p the picture quality is great! I haven't noticed any issues with dead pixels or the glass coming off of the screen. Everything is really nice. Setup was easy, I did have to create a Roku account but I wasn't charged anything. I use this TV mostly for Spotify, HBO Go, and Netflix. It gets great wifi signal too, the room I keep the tv in usually has very poor signal on devices, but with this the streaming is not effected by the poor wireless signal. It works a lot better than I expected it to.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Urlacher

customer_reviews.title: Could turn on faster, otherwise perfect for dorms
customer_reviews.text: It's good for a dorm room. I got the 32" and it fits well on the desk that came with my room. I have the abc, fox, cw, lifetime,etc., apps and I can usually watch shows 1-8 days after they aired, with only a few commercials during the breaks. Only reason that I couldn't give it five stars is that sometimes it's slow to turn on, it takes about a minute for it to be able to register my click on the app I want in these situations.
customer_reviews.author: WrenABen

customer_reviews.title: This television is super awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This television is super awesome!! We put it in the "Game Room" for teenage boys. They LOVE it!! Picture is terrific!! Easy to set up!! The only downfall is if you want to watch Cable TV you can enter the channel by number. You have to scroll up and down the dial, but they are always on Prime, Netflix, YouTube or gaming... .So, not a big deal. Great TV is getting away from cable or dish subscriptions!! <3
customer_reviews.author: Great game to pass waiting room time!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great value and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I actually am quite surprised by how easy this was to use and set up. I didn't expect much for a cheaper TV, but it's actually much better than I expected. I didn't know how to use a Roku, but it was really easy to set up channels and connect to my Prime account. Great bargain for my fireplace room that doesn't have a cable box.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Hargreaves

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage, Avoid This Item
customer_reviews.text: We've had issues since the first week of owning this television. I wish we had returned it then. Needs to be rebooted often, picture quality is poor and the TV seems to be made cheaply. It's already broken and has stopped turning on. There are no buttons so I have no way of knowing if it is the remote or the TV itself. I absolutely regret buying this TV and will never buy one of this companies products again.
customer_reviews.author: Phinehas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic TV for the price. I love having the Roku interface built in. Makes things much simpler. Just plug in and go. This TV is head and shoulders better than one I bought a couple years ago for 4x the price. The only negative is that there isn't a Ethernet port on it. I understand why at this price point, but it would be nice to have even at a slightly higher price. No problems so far with the WiFi, but I would feel better about using it solely for streaming if it had Ethernet. That way I would know there wasn't going to be any issues in the future. But overall a great TV.
customer_reviews.author: David T

customer_reviews.title: good TV, but I don't trust it online
customer_reviews.text: This has been an excellent TV for the price. I have no complaints after a year. The picture and sound quality are nice - nothing amazing, but great for the price. It has all the connections I need and more. The ability to log onto the Internet sounds interesting but I've never used it since it wants me to make an obnoxious agreement before going online, and given what the agreement says I can't trust the TV with my personal information. They apparently make money selling your viewing habits to people, can convert the TV into a remote listening device at the goverment's request, etc. I'll leave my TV offline, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Adam M.

customer_reviews.title: Should have paid attention to the negative reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box screen static, resolution lines throughout the screen, Could not even get to the screen tv setup page to come through the static lines. Dont think it would take much to damage this set in transport. I'm sure the banging around of this box in transit could account for part of it's failure. Plus it is low quality, You can tell. You get what you pay for. Needless to say this Smart TV is going back and don't want a replacement. Going to look for a better quality TV.
customer_reviews.author: Ken F.

customer_reviews.title: A truly smart, economical, and easy to use SMART TV
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a smart TV. I have 2 roku players and 1 Apple TV but much prefer the roku. So when I wanted a TV for the kitchen that would be both wifi and smart I decided to buy the TCL Roku TV. Better than expected! It is so light that we move it around the house when we want an extra TV to see several sports events at the same time. The Roku media player allows us to use a flash drive to show videos and photos from recent trips. Perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: EJGPIgrl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly for the price point, it has been really good. The sound is a bit weak. But I use it for Hulu, Netflix and Amazon and it is great. Once in a while it freezes but I am using several video streaming apps. If you have cable service also, you can watch your cable tv through it without running the coaxial cable to it. It goes via the internet and I've had zero problems with it. It does take a few seconds to change channels because it is via internet but a great feature. No more cable box rental. All in all I really like the tv.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Beware, this is a Roku Devices that supports TV.
customer_reviews.text: Picture is good, setup is straight forward, but buyer beware. If you think you are purchasing a TV with Roku installed you are not. You are purchasing a Roku device, that will support streaming TV via an Roku app and the supple remote does not have a 10 key, it is a Roku remote. In addition, the WiFi signal pickup on the unit is not the best on the market, but it is antiquate. Now I'm not bad mouthing the Roku Device (TV) as you can see I gave it 4 Stars, I'm just saying that don't expect it to work like a TV, because it is (in my mind) a Roku Devices that supports TV.
customer_reviews.author: Gervais C Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: I think it is perfect for anything other than a Family Room
customer_reviews.text: In today's world this is a small TV. I think it is perfect for anything other than a Family Room. This TV has so many Roku channels that when coupled with a simple TV antenna you can watch almost anything you would ever want to see. The world is distracted by larger TVs and this panel makes up for almost any shortfall. As long as you are not expecting a cinema experience on a 60 inch TV you will LOVE this device. So nice to have so much internet streaming built into a tiny box. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the sound is pretty low, the bass is meh
customer_reviews.text: Visual 4/5 Audio 4/5 Value 5/5 The image quality of this tv is just avg. it's nothing special about it. The Audio is a little bit disappointing, the sound is pretty low, the bass is meh, but nothing a sound bar couldn't fix. the Roku is a nice touch to this all, I really like the Roku addition. It's the best way to go if you don't want to pay for cable and just want to connect online. There are a lot of free channel such as news and free tv! All you need to do is connect to the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but freezes occasionally
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size for my bedroom. The wifi connection works really well. I would give this 5 stars, but it does freeze up every now and then which worries me. It's always fixed if we just unplug the tv and plug it back in, but how convenient is that while in the middle of a movie? I hope this is a tv that lasts a while. The price was great for what we got.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: problems down the road
customer_reviews.text: It started out awesome with no issues, great picture quality, great sound quality but now a few months later the screen has started going black in the middle of a movie and nothing fixes it except turning the tv off and then back on. This really upsets me because I love my 42" TLC TV and have always recommended the TLC brand to friends and family looking for new TV's, I bought this TV as a gift for my boyfriend and I am so disappointed that it is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Honestreviews24

customer_reviews.title: I was a little annoyed that some channels that have free access to certain ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried downloading a few free channels just to check them out and have found entertaining ways to pass the time. I was a little annoyed that some channels that have free access to certain episodes require a sign in when downloaded but that says nothing to the quality of this tv. This is my first smart tv and I'm pretty happy with it. I cut cable and instead subscribed to Amazon Prime and Hulu. My kids also love that they can listen to Pandora or YouTube on the tv without having to connect their electronic devices. I have had zero issues. Sign in and assembly are easy. The remote is simple. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Died after a year of light use.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a year. Went out ONE DAY after warranty. I moved it to a different room and only a blue screen came on. It was probably used once a week if that, however for the money it’s absolutely ridiculous that I got maybe 52 uses, generous number st that. Their customer service for the warranty program is a huge joke! They were nothing but rude and basically told me SOL. Purchased after seeing the good reviews, but I will never return to this brand again. Yes you save money but it’s not worth the switch!
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: I Like It
customer_reviews.text: Bought Cyber whatever day for one twenty five plus tax. Great picture, sound. I have in my office. Pic is actual Judge Judy show. I won't put the rest of tech stuff here because it's already been listed. We cut cable years ago so what you see is antenna. We get about 30 channels with free over the air antenna. On occasion I buy movies from Amazon and keep in my video library even tho I'm not at this time a Prime member. They play clear. I really have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Spy-der's Corner

customer_reviews.title: Great tv for the value
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this tv for just over 3yrs now. Great picture, love having a smart TV. The volume is random sometimes. Like, you'll randomly need to turn the volume way up and after an hr it'll then blast on you. The remote control just stopped working. I ordered a new one for $7 off Amazon. But I liked this tv do much, I bought a bigger one for another room.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Eiden

customer_reviews.title: Great HDTV for the price
customer_reviews.text: I finally received my new tv....it was a great purchase!!! Picture and sound are fantastic.....Sling TV, Amazon and Netflix perform fantastic with my internet service....the only weird part that happens is the audio will stop working if you are in one of the HDMI modes and not close it off....my tv went silent and scared the heck out of me. I was watching a movie on off air tv....when I switch out of it....everything was silent until I closed out the off air tv.....very strange quirk.... Other than that....thank you Amazon for triple packing the box!!! Wow it was a little heavy🙃🙃
customer_reviews.author: uwbucky85

customer_reviews.title: Piece of JUNK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible!! It worked for a few days and then began freezing up and crashing. Then it could not connect to the internet so I upgraded my wireless router. That did not help. None of my other wireless devices have issues so it must be the tv. I have my service provider coming to check into this further. If he cannot resolve this problem, I intend to send this back. Very frustrating and the TCL support group is useless!!! Be smart; DO NOT buy this item!
customer_reviews.author: George Harris

customer_reviews.title: Avoid....Save youself a lot of trouble
customer_reviews.text: I have had three of these now, all returned. Every one without exception had screen fluttering on streaming (Netflix and Amazon) and direct connect to DVD. The only picture mode setting that would stop the fluttering was "movie" mode. If you selected any of the others the screen would flicker periodically during some scenes. I called TCL and got passed over to Roku for an hour session without success. Neither could solve or explain the cause of the issue. I expected a far better quality of product given the reviews. Even at this price point the quality should be better.
customer_reviews.author: Claude B.

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but rather spend the money on a REAL smart tv
customer_reviews.text: For the price, the tv is okay. It claims it is a "smart" tv, but many times it has failed to impress me. Very few times it has frozen like an old computer, and you have to wait minutes for it to even slightly respond. I bought this tv to avoid buying a roku and a new tv, but perhaps I should have just spent the extra money to buy a REAL smart tv from Sony or Samsung. Besides that, the picture is very good, and the sound is too. Other than a bit of laggy response (not as fast as a normal roku) it does the job, just not the best job.
customer_reviews.author: PineconeRiot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome features, really good (but not perfect) picture. Non-standard VESA holes but there are mounting options!
customer_reviews.text: After a couple weeks of use I'm a big fan of this TV. It's a nice size for a bedroom and the built-in Roku functionality makes it a one-stop-shop. The picture is not perfect but it's far better than expected for a set in this price range. I have noticed that the picture quality depends greatly on the stream quality. Oddly, Netflix does not give the best picture. Other streams (HBO Go, Amazon Prime Video, HGTV, PBS Kids, etc.) look great. As others have noted, the mounting holes are not a standard VESA pattern. Don't let that scare you away. I picked upand it works great.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: SCREEN FREEZES AND ALL CHANNELS (broadcast)  report no signal when you attempt to watch single channel (45.3)
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months the TV repeatedly stops receiving channel 45.3 here and ALL CHANNELS report NO SIGNAL. The system will not turn off using the remtote. After playing with it for several minutes you may be able to cycle power and it will appear ok until you watch channel 45.3 again for 15 seconds and the whole thing repeats. The composite port appears to hang too! The TV is directly connected to aXtreme Signal HDB91X Xtreme Long Range Yagi. The antenna works fine with my Panasonic 50". Support replaced the unit and the replacement does the same thing. Tried factory reset + bios reset multiple times. Tried another antennas. Support appears to be stuck (heard nothing for 24 hours).
customer_reviews.author: Old Dan

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Roku stick instead
customer_reviews.text: When I received this tv the cable port was broken and I love Amazon because I called them and they sent out a new tv immediately. At first this tv was great with the built in ROKU. However about 6 months ago this tv would reset itself every couple of weeks. Now it does it daily and now about twice a week this tv completely goes black and makes a loud humming noise. I them have to unplug then plug it back in to work. Its getting worse and I doubt that it Will last another 6 months. I will be buying a new one soon and will be going with a new Roku stick instead of a smart tv.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Schell aka Skelly

customer_reviews.title: Tv is nice but would like it to be known that it ...
customer_reviews.text: Tv is nice but would like it to be known that it does not come with its stand.. I called and asked why and they said that accessory is not included. Tho I disagree about the stand that all TVs come with as being an accessory I can't frown on the tv because the tv is great just lower stars for the seller/understanding what you are getting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price, just needs a more complete (programmable) remote control.
customer_reviews.text: A great TV for the price, fast and easy to set up too.... especially fast and easy to set up on my Wi-Fi as well. I would give it five stars except for its remote control which is not programmable. It would be perfect if the supplied TCL-Roku remote could be programmed to also be able to control my cable TV box so I don't need both remotes. Needing two remotes just to watch the local cable stations in this day and age is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Bransford

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this so far
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thing, so far! It's super light, which made for easy wall mounting. Picture is good, sounds good, has an Ample number of auxiliary ins and outs, and the interface of the remote control is intuitive. Just about as intuitive as the Apple TV remote. I am very pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: trying to help

customer_reviews.title: Don't understand the bad reviews I saw at Amazon but for me the ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't understand the bad reviews I saw at Amazon but for me the LEDTV work perfectly, I live in Puerto Rico and rcvd it on time via UPS ... not even a scratch. The control work well, normal delay when starting up as I have it on WIFI, software works ok, no out of normal delays when changing ROKU channels, I have a 40meg internet connection and I don't notice any delays, freeze or sound quality loss when viewing movies. Bought it with a MD2351 mounting kit from Amazon which fit perfectly ... kit came with a magnetic level and everything needed for $11.99 in so I'm a happy with my new toy !
customer_reviews.author: Osvaldo J

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: The Roku web streaming TV exceeded our expectations. I had worried that our Century Link high speed DSL and 5-yr-old modem/router would not be beefy enuf for a good streaming experience, but the Roku worked perfectly with them right out of the box. Loved the easy setup, and many of the content sources we love are already installed. Easily found and installed the rest. There was even an app for a local channel! So far, do not need cable. Picture quality is fine, color is true, remote is easy
customer_reviews.author: Pat Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Patio TV
customer_reviews.text: Needed a good value TV for the lanai without cable hookup available. This connected to the home WiFi quickly and once we added our favorite channels, we were surfing Netflix, Amazon & Pandora from the pool. Picture is adequate quality for outdoor, sunlit area that often has strong glare. Sound is good enough to replace the outdoor speakers for music. Price could not be beat. Very lightweight, worked well with the inexpensive wall TV mount also purchased from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: KimChe3

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: I had issues with it being delivered without a power cord but Amazon refunded me the cost of shipping and actual cost of a cord. Then I had issues getting it to sync to my accounts but one email to TCL and it worked well. I'm happy with the purchase. It's very clear, volume excellent, and its so lightweight and streamlined it works well in my little apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Bodine

customer_reviews.title: ROKU TV I LOVE IT. NO COMMERCIALS
customer_reviews.text: I received my TV in a couple of days after ordering it from Amazon. You are the best Amazon. I set it up in less than 15 minutes and my Roku account takes a few steps through your mobile phone. I have Amazon prime and Netflix to begin. NO COMMERCIALS I LOVE IT. I had to adjust my WIFI to accommodate ROKU as I kept losing sound. I had my WIFI reset at 12 no further crashes. The TV has brilliant color compared to my 720 which I passed along to my daughter , the color is unbelievablely better. Thank you AMAZON and ROKU for a better viewing experience. I recommend this TV
customer_reviews.author: Virginia M. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. The 32" is a perfect size for my exercise room. It is also much lighter than I anticipated making it much easier to hang on the wall. I have this set up in my basement- behind concrete and it had no problem picking up my wifi signal. The process of setting up the RUKO for the first time is lengthy but that can be shortened if you set up an account in advance and just sign in. One note: the volume on the remote is on the right side of the remote. It took me a few minutes to figure that out- but I also didn't even glance at any of the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: socr03

customer_reviews.title: I liked the tv alright before the screen cracked like the ...
customer_reviews.text: The screen broke and despite paying $40 for the pos 360 degree Assurant Protection Policy that extends the warranty past the manufacturer's to 4 years, and claims that "mechanical and electrical failure are covered after the manufacturer’s warranty expires." it's entirely false. It's a scam. "Hey, but we'll pretend we're gonna send you your $40 back! Sure. I liked the tv alright before the screen cracked like the p.o.s. plastic it is. Actually, I'm pretty sure Satan lived inside of this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: not a bad smart tv
customer_reviews.text: -im no tv snob so im easily satistfied with this tv. sometimes it takes a minute to load or its like the remote isnt responding because maybe the sensor range/window is small. i wish there was a shortcut to setting up the wifi connection. -STURDY. my cat nocked it down from an approximate 3ft dresser on top of a laundry basket and an open drawer. the screen or hardware were not damaged at all. it took a minute to start up, but has worked normal since. -a couple times ive noticed the screen seemily emmitting some dull light from a block across the screen while off. it eventually faded away and have had no further issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsoceles

customer_reviews.title: but it was so easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Roku TV purchase in one month. I purchase this to used in my guest rooms, but it was so easy to install, so user friendly and just didn't require any cable boxes, that I order more and am getting ready to say bye bye to my old and expensive cable provider. This product is highly recommended for anyone whose wondering how to lose that extra bill at the end of the month without compromising on their weekly shows on television. I will definitely be purchasing more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Casynella A. Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: You know the saying "you get what you pay for"? Well I actually think I got more than I paid for. I purchased this for a bedroom in our second home so my son could play video games when we visit, I cannot believe how great the picture looks. Part of the reason I purchased this was because we stream Amazon, Netflix, and Hulu and since it has all of that I wouldn't need to rent one more box from the cable company, but is also has other free networks which was a nice bonus. When he is off to college I will definitely purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Estero, FL resident

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV, tiny remote.
customer_reviews.text: I love the crap out of this TV. I have had it for quite a while now, probably more than a year ago? It looks fantastic and is extremely responsive. It made me feel like the Samsung it replaced was junk. The ONLY problem is that the remote is TINY. I lose this friggin thing within a minute of putting it down. Every single time. The remote itself is awesome when you can find it! I love Roku smart tvs and they absolutely blow Samsung smart TVs out of the water and I'm getting paid nothing to say this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!  Can't go wrong for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this TV on a whim for the deck on our vacation home. Couldn't have been more pleased. You just can't beat it for the money, great picture and just enough features to keep you from losing your mind trying to figure them out! I wanted them for the whole house after using it, but my wife wants silver frames, and they only come in black 😔 Anyway, if you want a nice TV at a great price and all the features you need plus wifi, this is it! Oh, and if you have questions, post them here, if none of the consumers respond, the manufaturer will! They did for me!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap but the picture quality is disappointing. Colors do not pop compared to other television displays and it feels very low quality. Not surprised considering it is a mass-produced product from China. Only purchase this if you need an emergency cheap television set. For long-term use, look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful TV
customer_reviews.text: This is a remarkable TV, if you have a good wifi router. My Comcast Residential Gateway single channel wireless router could not provide a good enough signal, even when less than 30' away (that will be the subject of another review). I bought a TP Link Archer C9 AC 1900 dual band router and problem is solved (also the subject of another review). The Roku functionality is great and the picture quality is wonderful. My only knock on this TV is that it does not include an Ethernet connection, for that reason I knocked off one star. Otherwise it is a great TV.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Atwell

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace a Vizio smart tv that I got from a big box store. The Vizio was horrible, the wifi almost never worked with it and it definitely wasn't the Internet itself that was the problem because I've yet to have trouble connecting with this tv. There are so many apps, ive had it for a week and I still haven't explored everything. Awesome tv, DEFINITELY RECOMEND!
customer_reviews.author: FloridaGIrl

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this a zero star rating if I could. Very disappointed in it. Up until a month ago this TV Worked great, but now when watching a program it will freeze and I will have to turn TV off or go out of the channel I am watching and back into, VERY FRUSTRATING, because I will have missed parts of the program I am watching. Since I've had this TV 5 months already I doubt anything can be done by manufacturer or seller, but will update if they make this unhappy customer satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.K

customer_reviews.title: It's as good as the competition and the price is better
customer_reviews.text: we bought this refurbished in October of 2015 I believe and it works great it still works great as good as any 32 inch smart TV on the market and it's held up. The kids is it for gaming we haven't connected with an antenna we get about 30 channels in our area with the antenna we have no complaints with us TV giant
customer_reviews.author: The Girl Geek

customer_reviews.title: Simple and priced right!
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a nicely priced television with built in router Roku is where to go. Not a lot of bells and whistles but extremely easy to set up and stream. If you don't have cable you can purchase channels directly from Roku and take advantage of a lot of free channels and offers. I highly recommend if you a looking for simplicity and value and getting rid of cable.
customer_reviews.author: Gustave

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality on the tv is way better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I finally got my TV that I ordered for my mom, it was her present from that she longed deserved. It was thought to be missing as it didn't initially show up in the mail, but luckily my neighbor watched over it while I was not home. The picture quality on the tv is way better than I expected, and the added value of it being a Roku TV, we have various options of what we choose to watch such as: Sling, Netflix, YouTube, etc... and the remote is slim line, simple to use and easy for her to navigate menu-to menu.
customer_reviews.author: Marquis McGhee

customer_reviews.title: No internet connectivity
customer_reviews.text: If it worked, it would be great. All my favorite streaming sites and more. Color is great. Sound is good. Internet connection. What internet connection? I have to play a game of restarting the router and then the tv multiple times to finally get a connection that may or may not last a couple of hours. I'm so tired of the connection issues. I have other devices that connect perfectly to my internet connection with no issues. Roku is like having dial up connected to rabit ears.
customer_reviews.author: Shops a lot

customer_reviews.title: Great kids dresser tv.
customer_reviews.text: bought this for Christmas 1--2 years back for my boy. he still loves it- remote is IR ( need to point at tv) but the WIFI remote app on my phone integrates with the TV as well . i have a Samsung Galaxy S3 , and my wife an apple - both work. sound is not fantastic (like JBL Quality) but louder than my son will ever need it - i have to tell him to turn it down from time to time. Has HDM inputs as wel for other things such as a pc video card; xbox or cable box. - very nice.
customer_reviews.author: C. CALLAWAY

customer_reviews.title: Great for viewing movies, but no support for public wifi, and low res as pc monitor
customer_reviews.text: It is okay for watching netflix in general, and other movies, but the screen resolution and refresh rate isnt good enough to use as a computer monitor. I dont use it for that, but if you intend on that, pick a product with higher specs. Also the roku software will not allow you to connect to a public wifi (where you have to enter username and pw on a browser) even though the roku stick and roku box will allow you to do this, the roku tv on the TCL television will not allow you to do this. You will have to end up buying a new streamer if you are using this in your dorm room or wherever
customer_reviews.author: JJ Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Buy It Now
customer_reviews.text: This this is everything you need plus more. Netflix, Pandora, Popcornflix, you name it. You can also add channels provided from your cable provider like Starz, A&E, & VH1. All which i actual watch through my direct tv account. So basically i don't even need a cable box in my room like everyone else in my home. It has a usb port than you can watch your personal content through. The capacity for USB is 32 GB, any large some files will not work. Proper USB Format is MS-DOS(FAT32). Video Quality actually 720p! Overall, I love this product and this is my first day. Will update if needed.
customer_reviews.author: La'Darrin Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Very nice SMART TV
customer_reviews.text: Great Smart TV for the price. Perfect for the kids bonus/media room. Easy to navigate. Great Wi-Fi connectivity (so far anyway- with Netflix, Amazon Prime and HBO GO). Love that you can go online to Roku and add and delete apps. Got about 50 apps so far...could basically cut the cable cord with this thing (we have Dish- so the other cool thing is you can add cable stations with your provider account-- like HGTV, Travel Channel, etc). Nice picture and sounds is nice too. Remote is super easy to use-- they really did their research on this one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Putts

customer_reviews.title: First smart TV I enjoyed using, TV alone is also an amazing value
customer_reviews.text: First off, this TV is an amazing value and it's worth it just for that. I'm very pleased with the picture, sound, and connectivity. The built-in Roku is also awesome, this is the first smart TV I've used that I actually liked; it's especially good for Netflix. Although for some things like Spotify and streaming content on my local network (Roku Media Player has kinda crappy support for streaming x264 encoded videos on a DLNA server), a chromecast worked much better.
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

customer_reviews.title: If you only want a TV that lasts for 2.5 years, buy this one
customer_reviews.text: About 1.5 years into owning this TV, I noticed a thin blue line going across about the middle of the screen. Six months later, the TV is completely useless and no longer functional. I turned it on and there is half of a picture and the other half is moving lines (resembles scrambled bar codes). Our family is on a very tight budget and we can't replace this TV any time soon. I will never purchase another one through this company.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't make it to year 3
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a good buy... well you get what you pay for, the TV died just after the 3 year warranty I purchased expired. Stay way from TCL and just pay the extra for a brand name. I've had my 55 in LG for over 5 years, and replaced the POS TCL TV with a Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: k24A8

customer_reviews.title: Great TV with Easy-to-use Roku installed.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with the built-in Roku with a sharp picture. Needed hard-to-find 28" to fit old entertainment center and was able to get this TV to fit. The assembly was easy, but it was hard for me to get the HDMI cable into the port because I had to bend the cable around the support bar in the back while trying to keep it flat to push int the port. Also, the volume has to be adjusted with the Roku remote and won't work on the service provider's remote but worth using 2 remotes to watch movies and other media.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen E. Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Freezing screen
customer_reviews.text: Just got my TV today. I was able to get it connected to my wife long enough to do the manditory software updates and now it will not connect to any WiFi or hot spot. The screens are constantly freezing. And to top it off about every minute to minute and a half the TV reboots itself. I would not recommend this tv.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but not flawless
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for streaming promotional videos off YouTube. I originally wanted to use a flash drive with videos on it, but this tv kept corrupting the video files, so I decided to stream them instead. The only downfall is that this tv will not play all the videos on a specific YouTube channel. It will play a majority of them then eventually play videos that were not part of the specified channel. I have several ROKU tv's that all do the same thing...
customer_reviews.author: The Hobby Shop of Aberdeen, NJ

customer_reviews.title: Has be the best TV Ive ownd so far your possibilities are definitely ...
customer_reviews.text: Has be the best TV Ive ownd so far your possibilities are definitely not limited the only reason I did not give 5 stars is because every once in awhile it completely freezes none of your apps will open and you have to reboot the TV to be able to watch anything but with a simple app from the Roku store named crash with one click you can effectively reboot your TV overall great product very happy with the buy
customer_reviews.author: morales Julian

customer_reviews.title: Defective unit quickly replaced
customer_reviews.text: My first unit had a defective row of pixels. I requested an exchange and received it within 2 days, before I returned the defective one, which must be returned within 30 days. The tv boots up slowly, sometimes taking a few minutes, perhaps due to the Roku part. I had expected it to have a Roku 2 chip but the Roku IOS app identifies it as a Roku 1 so having the oldest Roku chip may be the cause of it's slow performance. Overall, aside from encountering a defective unit, it works fine as a bedroom tv. Rating 3.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: mindtravel

customer_reviews.title: Delightfully surprised at the quality of the tv and the Roku interface!!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I'm pleasantly surprised and impressed with the amazingly intelligently designed Roku interface that shows that a remote control can be extremely simply designed yet be easier to use than one with 50 buttons on it. It's a real pleasure to use adjust picture controls, etc., and the picture quality is in my humble opinion, very, very good. So far, I'm only streaming Netflix from my router which is 60 feet away and through walls and floors, but the image from "The Flash" series looks beautiful, and tack sharp, with no faltering of quality at all. Just very happy with everything about the tv and the Roku interface. VERY Pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul R DesRoches

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart Tv! Even Better Value!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I've had this tv for over a year now and it works perfectly. I have every thing i need over the internet using the roku screen and don't even have cable connected. Awesome awesome value!!! P.s. The only con that I see with the tv is it needing a sound bar as the tv sound is low low and terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: It worked for a year and a half
customer_reviews.text: when it worked, it was great. The visual quality was good. The sound was ok. But I paid $300 for this tv to work for a year and half. It started not connecting to the Internet. I then tried to call their support team, they blamed my internet even though every other device in the house worked. Just disappointed. I tried to use a blu Ray DVD player but the tv would turn off and on a lot. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia L
